description: ['la petite save my face pillow. measures 19" x 10" x 3" thick. suspends your face while you are stomach or side sleeping to reduce facial compression which can cause wrinkling and premature aging. also opens nasal passages for improved breathing. made in the usa at our factory in southern california. we are used and recommended by skin care professionals and plastic surgeons. save my face 30 day return policy. all items, case, pillow & travel bag must be returned in good condition meaning no staining, alterations, tears, pet hairs or missing items. if it is in poor condition, you may be charged a 15% restocking fee. if it is in unacceptable condition; meaning torn &/or highly soiled, do not return it. if you have further questions please give us a call as we are delighted to speak with you! our customers have found it very helpful to watch the 8 minute instructional video to help in determining which size pillow to order. here is the link http://www.savemyface.com/which-pillow-is-right-for-me/']

title: be natural organics niacin complex balancing mist 2 oz (60 ml)
description: ["have you ever heard that it's best to apply body lotion right after you get out of the shower while your skin is still moist? the same is true of the skin on your face. it's best to moisturize damp skin because the moisturizer (or facial oil) will help preserve the hydration in the skin and the skin will be better able to absorb the active ingredients in the moisturizer. with this concept in mind, be natural organics offers a selection of balancing mists to apply before our serums and moisturizers. (or any other time you'd like). niacin complex balancing mist is a powerhouse of nutrients that tighten, nourish, and protect the skin. its liposome delivery system provides vital cellular building blocks to skin while balancing its ph. specifically formulated to combat the signs of aging, this balancing mist contains alpha lipoic acid and coq10 to reduce fine lines, dmae to lift and firm, and hyaluronic acid to plump and moisturize. it's all combined in a base of organic aloe vera juice that acts as a multi-vitamin for the skin. beyond this, the beautiful, botanical scent of the mist will make it a luxurious pleasure to use in your daily routine. be natural organics uses all natural ingredients to deliver the best organic skin care products. visit benaturalorganics.com for more information."]

description: ['drug facts: uses: temporarily relieves minor aches and pains due to: minor arthritis pain, headaches, colds, temporarily reduces fever & muscular aches allergy alert: aspirin may cause a severe allergic reaction which may include: facial swelling asthma (wheezing) hives shock alcohol warning: if you consume 3 or more alcoholic drinks every day, ask your doctor whether you should take aspirin or other pain relievers/fever reducers. aspirin may cause stomach bleeding. do not use: if you have ever had an allergic reaction to aspirin or any other painreliever/fever reducer. ask a doctor before use if you have: asthma ulcers a bleeding problem stomach problems that last or come back such as heartburn, upset stomach or pain ask a doctor or pharmacist before use if you are taking a prescription drug for: gout diabetes arthritis anticoagulation (blood thinning) when using this product limit the use of caffeine containing drugs, foods, or drinks, because too much caffeine may cause nervousness, irritability, sleeplessness, and occasionally, rapid heartbeat stop use and ask a doctor if: an allergic reaction occurs. seek medical help right away. ringing in ears or loss of hearing occurs new symptoms occur pain gets worse or lasts more than 10 days fever lasts more than three (3) days redness or swelling is present if pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a health professional before use. it is especially important not to use aspirin during the last three (3) months of pregnancy unless definitely directed to do so by a doctor because it may cause problems in the unborn child or complications during delivery. keep out of reach of children. in case of overdose, get medical help or contact a poison control center right away. quick medical attention is crucial for adults as well as for children even if you do not notice any signs or symptoms. store at room temperature']

title: patanjali aloevera gel 150ml
description: ['aloe vera plants have medicinal properties and hence are widely used in treating the burns, cuts, insect bites and several other skin ailments. this is one product that you must keep in your house, so that you can easily treat the kitchen burns and other injuries without wasting time. the uses of aloe vera plant are known since centuries but still many people are not aware about the conditions that can be treated with it. due to the effectiveness of aloe vera in treating skin conditions it has been included in various cosmetics and facial creams. in case you are suffering form acne trouble and have tried almost all the creams and medicines available in the world and have not had success, then you will be glad to know how effective aloe vera is in treating acne. being natural it is not at all harsh on skin and hence there is no need to worry about side effects. if your skin is too dry and if it feels rough upon touching, regular application of aloe vera will give you a smooth and soft skin. the cleansing agents present in this plant keeps your skin clean and thus keeps it dirt and dust free. applying aloe vera on your skin is like your first step towards a healthy skin. directions: apply generously to all areas of the skin. apply frequently to help maintain the moisture and to help prevent peeling.']

title: simco hair fixer 500ml
description:
['product information

what does a mans beard have to do with the downturn? everything, if you run simla chemicals (simco), a company known globally for the hair fixers it manufactures. 

simcos history began before independence with sardar pratap singh bagga, a sturdy sikh with a long, flowing beard, learning lessons on chemicals in the famous lahore perfumery bhaion ki dukaan (the shop of brothers). 

with time, bagga moved to shimla and set up his own business in 1948. four years later, he chose to give up a comfortable life and moved to delhi. he felt the market here was penetrable, son kuldeep singh bagga, 62, recounts.

although the enterprising bagga rarely used a beard fixer in his life, he was quick to realise that other men in his community could not do without a glue to keep their untrimmed facial hair  integral to the sikh identity  in place.

sixty-seven years later, simco, short for shimla chemicals, has not only penetrated the market but has become a virtual synonym for all beard fixers. 

today, the firm boasts of a customer base of 1 million spread across india and 12 countries including the us, the uk, canada and australia.

 

product specifications

 

net wt. 17 fl.oz (500ml) 
product of india
packaging: plastic 
product type: hair fixer (straigtner)']

(do not use scented oils)- skin: jamaican black castor oils uses include skin disorders, burns, sunburns, cuts, and abrasions by direct application to the effected area.- acne: use vapor to open facial pores (preferably after a hot steamy shower), proceed by applying jamaican black castor oil in a massage style circular motion to effected area. allow to settle about 10-15 minutes then wash clean.how to use jamaican black castor oil scented- hair growth: apply jamaican black castor oil onto scalp by massaging with fingers and leaving overnight.- massage: boil water and set jamaican black castor oil for about 30 seconds the apply oil to area and gently massage.- do not use on eye browshow does extra strength differ from regular jamaican black castor oil?- simply organics extra strength jamaican black castor oil has a higher concentration of ash ove']

title: forest essentials tejasvi milk facial ubtan - 75gm
description: ['an ubtan is a traditional beautifying formulation made from dehydrated herbs, fruits, and nuts that are carefully blended to precise proportions for the purification and nourishment of the skin. this gentle dehydration process extracts the water from these rich and healing ingredients without changing or compromising their natural beautifying ingredients. adding a little bit of rosewater or a natural oil brings these blended powders to life rendering them a rich and rejuvenating cream pack for the sensitive skin of the face. these revitalizing ubtans are made with a complex blend of ayurvedic herbs that detoxify and tone the skin of the face while stimulating the metabolic activities of each cell and encouraging cell renewal. made with herbs like turmeric, saffron, and guduchi, these ubtans are rich with anti-oxidants and anti-bacterial agents that eliminate infection causing germs and scavenge free radicals to protect the face from the damage done by exposure to harmful uv rays and environmental pollutants. these herbs also purify the blood and provide vital nutrients like vitamins c, e, & a and minerals like iron and zinc which are essential for cell division and help them to maintain proper moisture levels. this special tejasvi facial ubtan revitalizes the skin from the inside out, bringing to the surface the beauty and vitality hidden below. it offers a complex profile of toning and detoxifying mineral rich clays that tone the skin and unclogs pores, by lifting excess oil and impurities and purifies the skin, leaving it clean and fresh. while invigorating herbal extracts stimulate the metabolic activities of the skin and improve its tejas, giving it a radiant and youthful glow. mix it with yogurt, milk, oils, rosewater or juices to and give your skin the care that only mother nature can, with exotic fruits and flowers of the himalayan forests..']

description: ['in ancient india, the men and women of royal households applied on their bodies and faces natural ayurvedic oils for the upkeep of their beauty and health. the regular applications and massages with these body oils and face oils - which were enriched with extracts of chosen ayurvedic herbs, roots, plants - nourished and revitalized the tissues and muscles, improved the blood circulation, cleansed and detoxified the skin pores. at the same time this made the muscles, tissues, joints, more flexible, elastic and supple, toned up the skin and made it smooth, soft, glowing and young. tarika night oil for face is prepared according to the ancient ayurvedic recipes of the indian royalty. extracts of chosen ayurvedic herbs with cosmetic and therapeutic benefits are processed in a sesame oil base to create this unique beauty oil. these extracts are known to possess vivifying, life-giving properties for the facial skin and tissues. they help to maintain the youthful elasticity and glow of the skin and prevent the early formation of wrinkles. regular application of tarika night oil for face for about three weeks shows a distinct improvement in skin tone, texture and general complexion. with tarika ayurvedic face oil you can get back that youthful and glowing look of your younger days - lost due to stress, late nights - in a totally natural way. tarika night oil contains special herbal extracts which aid in tissue formation and help to remove dark patches, acne scars, dark circles/ lines/shadows as well as spots, blackheads, fill up acne pits and give your skin a healthy and youthful glow ... in a completely natural way. for those who have rough and uneven skin regular use of tarika ayurvedic face oil makes the skin smooth and soft with a natural glow. tarika face oil keeps the skin blemish free and its special formula helps unclog the skin pores, heal blackheads and prevent new acne / pimple breakouts.']

description: ['this 2.15 ounces / 60 grams razorock is a natural mineral salt block that serves as an after-shave healing and antiseptic stick, used post-shave to calm and heal the skin. razorock soothes razor burn, relieves irritation and can also help stop the bleeding from a cut or nick. to use your razorock on cuts or nicks, wet the alum block and hold it on the cut for 30-40 seconds. since razorock is bactericidal, it can also be used as a deodorant. simply apply to the under arms after bathing or showering for 24-hour odor protection. due to its odor-repelling properties, razorock can also remove odors like fish or garlic from hands. it can even help with foot odor too. razorock can also be used as a facial toner if you have oily skin or are prone to acne. to use as a toner, wet the razorock and rub it gently on to skin before bed each night. razorock is made from potassium alum mineral salts, which have been used safely in products for thousands of years, so you can feel comfortable about its safety and efficacy. razorock alum block is non-staining and contains no alcohol or parabens. after using razorock, your skin will feel soft and soothed, with no greasy residue.']

description: ['', '** member handcrafted soap & cosmetics guild', 'handmade organic soap bar- pure lavender essential oil and fennel brazilian mud soap. this is a therapeutic handmade organic mud soap made using pure french lavender, fennel, and a mix of exotic mineral-rich brazilian muds. it also contains added aromatics such as patchouli and shea butter. french lavender is derived from the lavender plant which grows manly in northern africa and parts of europe while fennel is sourced from the fennel flower native to the mediterranean. the patchouli is obtained from the leaves of the patchouli herbs found mostly in asian regions.', 'brazilian mud is loved for its ability to sooth, cleanse, and rejuvenate the skin. the french lavender has antiseptic properties that help to fight skin infections while the fennel oil is loaded with vitamin c and potassium.', 'this mud soap bar is no-doubt a mix of many pleasurable ingredients that are bound to leave you smelling delightful thanks to the aromas of the patchouli, fennel, and lavender; while the brazilian mud soothes your skin. it’s perfect for facials, baths, and spa treatments.', 'handmade with fresh all-natural ingredients. no harmful chemicals or preservatives', 'it’s not your skin’s fault--it’s your soap! store-bought soap contains harsh chemicals that irritate your skin, often resulting in conditions like eczema, acne, and psoriasis. switch to falls rivers soap and experience the difference in using all-natural soaps created by hand using cold process soapmaking.', 'artisanal soap crafted the old fashioned way using cold process soapmaking. it is a perfect gift giving soap, stocking stuffer during holidays.']

['revitalize your skin!

description: ['anti-aging collagen cream is ideal for aging skin, protecting it from external aggressions, while nourishing it and providing flexibility and firmness. the combination of the soluble form of mriance bioactive collagen and the spilanthes acmella extract strengthens tissue elasticity and improves the skins ability to absorb and maintain moisture. its action on the supporting tissue rapidly reorganizes collagen fibers and visibly smooths the skin.by stimulating the fibroblast bio-mechanical functions, the anti-aging collagen cream will reorganize the dermis architecture. the skin density and firmness are then rapidly enhanced, leading to a reduction in skin roughness.visibly active, the action of this moisturizer is measurable from the first application.this rich anti-aging treatment cream is formulated from active ingredients that help the skin rapidly recover comfort and suppleness, leaving it intensely nourished and protected. it is ideal for dry skin types.active ingredientsmarine native collagenspilanthes acmella extractlepidium meyenii rootfractionated coconut oilmarine collagenthe skin is composed of 70% collagen, which alone accounts for 90% of connective tissue (dermis). collagen can retain up to eight times its own weight in water, which is why the protein substance is a primary moisturizing component of skin. our marine collagen restores skin properties with a healthy supply of collagen fibrils.firm and resistant skin highlights facial features and exhibits fewer wrinkles. natural marine collagen regenerates connective tissues that support skin structure. the ingredient also helps to deeply hydrate dry, mature skin, keeping cells healthy and strong.mriance natural marine collagen strengthens and revitalizes your skin']

title: skin obsession spa facial milk cleanser
description: ['skin obsession\'s gentle milk cleanser is a non-foaming mild cleanser that is good for any skin type. the soothing agents of aloe, milk, chamomile distillate, lavender distillate and green tea extract make this cleanser ultra mild and refreshing. the gentle natural exfoliating agents of organic multi-fruit acids found in bilberry extract, sugar cane extract, sugar maple extract, orange fruit extract, lemon extract and cranberry extract leave your skin feeling clean but not stripped. non-foaming milk cleansers are very effective cleansers for oily, dry, mature, sensitive and normal skin types. the gentle milk cleanser does not contain the typical surfactant or detergent ingredient that most cleansers contain. it is composed of oils and fats which are mild and effective cleansing agents. all oils and fats are complex compounds called triglycerides. oils and fats are a mixture of triglycerides with a different fatty acid attached. all fatty acid molecules are both lipophilic and hydrophilic. lipophilic means that it has a great affinity for oil. hydrophilic means that it has a great affinity for water. the hydrophilic molecules are attracted to water which helps the water "wet" the surface to be cleaned, permitting the water to reach more of the surface. the lipophilic molecules act like a magnet and are attracted to dirt and oils, they embed into the dirt and remove it. the lipophilic molecules show affinity toward oil and the molecules squeeze together in an attempt to escape water. the action of the hydrophilic molecules and the lipophilic molecules allows product to break the surface tension and forces water into the skin, allowing it to remove the dirt and oils beyond your skins surface. while it removes dirt and oils, it does it gently, without stripping your skin of moisture.']

description: ["how to use your pet sponge  thoroughly hydrate sponge before using on your pet  gently wipe away gunk and dirt in affected area  rinse sponge completely after each use. hang dry with attached string  compost when it wears out. it's completely biodegradable. konjac sponges are an all-natural, soft and gentle skincare tool. use as part of your pets heath care and grooming. works well even for pets very sensitive skin or skin allergies. konjac can help hydrate the skin and balance ph.  konjac sponges are made entirely from the root of the konjac plant which is native to korea, japan, china and southeast asia. they contains fibers that are by nature alkaline, and thus balances the skins natural acidity.  these fibers are packed with nutrients including iron, phosphorus, copper, zinc, vitamins a, e and d, b vitamins 1, 2, 6 and 12, vitamin c, and folic acid.  flat-faced dogs like pugs, pekingese, boxers, and bulldogs can be more prone to eye discharge than other breeds because their flatter faces often mean shallower eye sockets and protruding eyes. called brachycephalic breeds, dogs with more prominent eyes may have tear drainage problems  breeds with loose facial skin, like bloodhounds, cocker spaniels, beagles, saint bernards, and some terriers, can also benefit from cleaning around the folds of skin on the face, or drooling around the mouth"]

description: ['anti acne aging whitening skin treatment face mask + hair removal* skin toner astringent, antiseptic (acne control) and sunscreen 100% pure natural. organic powder and oil whitening benefits of thanaka thanaka has become one of the traditional beauty secrets in myanmar. it comes from the thanaka tree that is made from hard wood with a yellowish color and gives off a distinct pleasant odor. for centuries, the thanaka tree offers the myanmar women their beauty secrets. the trees extracts are known for their nourishing and hydrating components and whitening compositions. dermatologists are becoming highly interested in thanaka for its whitening and cooling effect to the skin which gives myanmar women their remarkable smooth and white skin. skin care benefits of thanaka aside from the lightening benefits of thanaka, cosmetic producers are also taking advantage of its anti-bacterial effects and use it as an ingredient in fighting acne and as an anti-blemish beauty product. tannic acids are also found in the tree which is responsible for tightening the skin to prevent sagging and it also protects the skin against the harmful uv rays from the sun that can cause skin darkening. it also provides a cooling sensation on the skin which is perfect for relaxing a tired facial skin that has been exposed to the various environmental radicals that can accelerate the aging process. the thanaka whitening powder provides several skin care benefits that are suited for both men and women and it is also safe to use in children. indication: skin protection from sunburn and skin damaged. in acne-prone areas, also works well as a spot treatment and facial mask.']

title: follique serum roll on for razor bumps ingrown hairs razor burn caused by waxing shaving and hair removal
description: ["razor bumps, ingrown hairs and razor burn are all common side effects of shaving, waxing and other forms of hair removal. razor bumps and ingrown hairs occur when the removed hair grows back into the skin, causing inflammation, pain and tiny bumps in the area where the hair was removed. ingrown hairs are a common condition that results from hair removal. it's most prevalent in black men who shave facial hair. but ingrown hairs can affect anyone with tightly curled hair who shaves, tweezes or waxes to remove hair. ingrown hairs also occur when the hair is weak and too thin not having the ability to break through the surface of the skin. use product sparingly to start and increase use as needed. stop use for one week if you experience over drying of skin, restart with less often applications."]

title: aoraem eyelash lash eyelashes wave curling perming curler rod glue perm kit sets
description: ["please refer to the instrument as below:  1. thoroughly cleanse eyelashes. 2. choose a proper roller based on the actual length of your eyelashes.  3. apply a thin layer of glue over your eyelashes.  4. wait a few seconds till the eyelashes become partially dry, stick the roller to the eyelashes. 5. apply another layer of glue onto the roller and wait another few seconds ( partially dry as well), use a toothpick carefully to turn the eyelashes onto the roller one by one  6. dip the pink lotion with a cosmetic tip and then apply it onto the roller, wait for 10-25 minutes (thin eyelashes: 10-15minnutes, average: 20 minutes, thick eyelashes: 25 minutes) before wiping out.  7. dip the colour blue lotion with a cosmetic tip and then apply it onto the roller, wait for 10-25 minutes (thin eyelashes: 10-15minnutes, average: 15-18 20 minutes, thick eyelashes: 18-20 minutes) before wiping out. 8. dip the yellow colour liquid with a cosmetic tip and then apply it onto the roller for about three minutes before wiping out.  9. dip the clear liquid with a cosmetic tip to clean the excess glue on the roller. finally, you have lovely and beautiful eyelashes. dos and don'ts: 1. never put this item into the refrigerator, only leave it in the shady and dry place. 2. never use the same cosmetic tips to dip different lotion or liquid.  3. never use metallic tips to dip lotion or liquid especially the pink one. 4. if any liquid or lotion goes into eyes, please use eye drops or distilled water to clean eyes.  5. you can't do any facial with steam until the next day after doing it, or the performance would be affected.  packages : 3x perm agent ,make eyelash natural curly  3x finalizing agent,keep eyelash curled about 3 months 2x moisturizing agent ,nourishes eyelashes lining  2x cleaning agent  1x eyelash curler glue 1x spatula  16x curler rod 6x curler patch"]

title: vanity planet moxispin on-the-go facial cleansing brush
description: ['', 'the vanity planet moxispin on-the-go facial cleansing brush is so super lightweight and compact that youll probably be surprised  shocked even  by the deep clean it delivers. it was meant for you to be able to take it with you anywhere, but that shouldnt mean your skin should have to sacrifice. this little brush is gentle but powerful, and sweeps away dirt, oil, makeup, and dead skin cells that your hands just cant, leaving behind soft, smooth, radiant skin. three interchangeable brush heads allow you to customize your routine: the daily cleansing facial brush with ultra-soft, nylon bristles for regular cleansing; the exfoliating brush head with quick drying bristles to slough away pore-clogging dirt and dead skin cells; and the silicone cleansing brush head, which has flexible bristles that are able to massage away debris and hardened dead skin cells without irritating sensitive skin types. additionally, the vanity planet moxispin on-the-go facial cleansing brush has bi-directional spin action, which means you can manually alternate between your brush going clockwise and counterclockwise to prevent constant tugging on your skin in the same direction.', 'because of the portability of the brush, its ideal for travel and tossing in your handbag or gym bag and the included storage case is large enough to carry both your usb charger and brush heads. the storage case also doubles as a counter stand for your brush while its not in use, so you can leave it upright to charge. while the brush is water-resistant, a built-in safety feature prevents it from turning on while it is plugged in.', 'how to use the vanity planet moxispin on-the-go facial cleansing brush attach the brush head of your choice to the vanity planet moxispin on-the-go facial cleansing brush. remove eye makeup with a makeup remover wipe. dampen both the brush head and your skin and apply your favorite cleanser or exfoliator to the brush head or work into a lather onto your skin. place the brush flush against your skin and press the on/off button to turn on the vanity planet moxispin on-the-go facial cleansing brush. gently move the brush head in small circular motions across the area you are cleansing or exfoliating, taking care not to press too hard; let the bristles do the work. press the on/off button again to turn off the vanity planet moxispin on-the-go facial cleansing brush. thoroughly rinse the brush head of any residue or exfoliator particles, blot excess water, and leave out to dry. once brush head is completely dry, store in storage case until next use.', 'caring for the vanity planet moxispin on-the-go facial cleansing brush rinse your brush heads thoroughly after each use. if it is discolored from makeup or debris, clean with warm, soapy water and allow to dry. do not use exfoliators with large, hard particles such as nuts or shells with the vanity planet moxispin on-the-go facial cleansing brush. do not submerge in water or use abrasive cleansers. clean the base and handle once a week with a slightly damp cloth. replace brush heads every 2-3 months. daily cleansing facial brush, exfoliating facial brush, and silicone cleansing brush heads are available on amazon.com.']

description: ["about the blackhead remover mask:this coveted black mask is formulated by natural ingredients such as bamboo charcoal, chamomile, green tea, and centella asiatica combing the power of nature with advanced technology to deeply clean the skin. extracted from natural bamboo ash, the activated charcoal has been prized for its powerful absorption abilities. it acts like a magnet to draw out dirt, debris and impurities. leaves skin feeling refreshed, youthful and silky-smooth to the touch. try this extraordinary skin-care experience right now!how to use:1. rinse your face with warm water and hot pack your face for 3-5 min with towel to open pores.2. apply few black mask on wrist to do an allergy test.3. spread blackhead mask on desired parts with brush and wait for 15-20 minutes (avoid the eyes, eyebrows and lip areas).4. gently peel it off then rinse with warm water and continue your skin care routine.warm prompt:1. rub a small amount of mask on the inside of your elbow area to test for any allergic reaction before using.2. stop using if discomfort or irritation occurs. 3. avoid contacting with eyes and keep out of the children's reach. 4. do not use blackhead mask on the areas with injuries, burns, eczema, or dermatitis.5. for better peel off result, we suggest you to apply thin layer black mask(around 1 mm).6. if the mask can not pull out of the tube, you can dip it into a warm water and it can be easy to pull out. the reason is that the mask might be storage in the wrong place during the transport or in the amazon warehouse.package including1blackhead mask1facial brush1usage manualwarrantyif you are not satisfied with the blackhead remover mask, we offer a full 100% refund. there is literally no risk for you, so don't hesitate to try our peel off mask."]

description: ['holy lama naturals curcuma soap is a turmeric soap with natural antibacterial properties. wild turmeric is recognized as a medical herb with strong antibiotic properties, which makes this soap very useful as an antibiotic and antiseptic soap.  tulsi extracts are used in ayurvedic remedies for common colds, headaches, stomach disorders, inflammation, heart disease, various forms of poisoning, and malaria. traditionally, tulsi is taken in many forms as herbal tea, dried powder, fresh leaf, or mixed with ghee. essential oil extracted from karpoora tulsi is used for medicinal purposes and in herbal cosmetics, and is widely used in skin preparations due to its anti-bacterial activity. for centuries, the dried leaves of tulsi have been mixed with stored grains to repel insects. the outer packaging is an attractive, eco-friendly clam-shell inspired cover held together by a piece of string, which also holds the label in place. easy to open and very pretty. the sturdy outer packaging can also double as a soap dish (great for travel). inside, the soap bar is wrapped in paper held together by the brand sticker.about holy lama: holy lama products are made by vaishali industries, which supports kudumbashree - a women oriented state poverty eradication mission of the government of kerala (south india). raw materials used in manufacturing the products are mainly sourced from local farmers in kerala. the factory uses natural ingredients for all products with no harsh chemicals or synthetics. the packaging is made from sustainable natural material where possible.* ethical * eco-friendly * natural * sls & paraben free * cruelty free*']
